chat.ejb.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    This interface provides the functionality for operations concerning users of the Enterprise WebSocket Chat application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authenticateUser(ChatRoomUser user)
      This method takes the username and password parameters and verifies a match in the database.
      java.util.List<ChatRoomUser> findAllUsers()
      This method returns all chat room users from the database.
      ChatRoomUser findUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This method uses the entity manager to retrieve the user associated with the given username.
      boolean persist(ChatRoomUser user)
      This method uses the entity manager to save a chat room user.
      void recordSignIn(java.lang.String username)
      This method stores a user sign-in event in the database.
      void recordSignOut(java.lang.String username)
      This method stores a user sign-out event in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        boolean authenticateUser(ChatRoomUser user)
        This method takes the username and password parameters and verifies a match in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the chat room user
        Returns:
        the indication of authentication

      • findUserByUsername

        ChatRoomUser findUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        This method uses the entity manager to retrieve the user associated with the given username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        the user or null if no user could be found

      • findAllUsers

        java.util.List<ChatRoomUser> findAllUsers()
        This method returns all chat room users from the database.
        Returns:
        the list of all users

      • recordSignIn

        void recordSignIn(java.lang.String username)
        This method stores a user sign-in event in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username

      • recordSignOut

        void recordSignOut(java.lang.String username)
        This method stores a user sign-out event in the database.
        Parameters:
        username - the username

      • persist

        boolean persist(ChatRoomUser user)
        This method uses the entity manager to save a chat room user.
        Parameters:
        user - the chat room user
        Returns:
        the indication of operation success or failure
